      irregular_table
         independent_variable control_value precision float
         independent_variable input         precision float
         dependent_variable                 precision float
         control_value 0.0
            input -1.0 -0.5  0.0  0.5  1.0
            values -0.8 -0.4  0.0  0.4  0.8
